title: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not do anything unless I first click on one of the "live" areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When I launch the Help view and press the tab key, nothing happens.
EB: When I launch the Help view and press the tab key, the focus should move to the next interactive element in the view.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Launch the Help view.  2. Press the tab key and observe that nothing happens. Expected behavior:  The focus should move to the next interactive element in the view when the tab key is pressed.
